cart.discount: A code for a {{discount}}% discount has been applied.

products.emptyCart: Your cart is empty. Add something to your cart to view it here.
products.confirmDeleteFromCart: Do you want to remove this product from the cart?
products.returnsDescription: There are a few important things to keep in mind when returning a product you purchased. You can return unwanted items by post within 7 working days of receipt of your goods.
products.14DaysToReturn: You have 14 calendar days to return an item from the date you received it.
products.returnsFromUs: Only items that have been purchased directly from Us.
products.allElements: Please ensure that the item you are returning is repackaged with all elements.

socialMedia.newsletterDesc: If you would like to receive the very latest updates on Shoplifter, new collections, behind-the-scenes image sand interviews, please click subscribe.
